Name: DeadOS
About the game: Simulation. Sandbox. Survival. DeadOS is an early access zombie outbreak simulator that focuses on city-wide outbreak scenarios where you have full access to customization of the experience from beginning to end, made by indie game developer and randomizer creator Benn Powell. Build your own zombie apocalypse! Do you want slow, shambling hordes that consume the living, or a fast, rapidly spreading infection that doesn't allow time to react? Features Up to 25,000 humans simulated in a city area of up to 900 city blocks. Nearly every element of the simulation is adjustable. Zombie speed. Human Accuracy. Ammunition. Take remote control of any individual during any point of the simulation, whether they are survivor or infected. Create your own city blocks to personalize the city Adjustable simulation speed to optimal performance for your machine. Retro visual style
